downloadTitle: Test Lab Guide: Demonstrate Forefront UAG DirectAccess
downloadDescription: Create a test lab that enables you to test Forefront UAG DirectAccess features and capabilities
detailsSection: This Test Lab Guide (TLG) allows you to create a Test Lab that you can use to test UAG DirectAccess features and capabilities. This Test Lab Guide contains instructions on how to build a single UAG DirectAccess server environment and test remote access to intranet resources. In addition, instructions are included that enable you to test DirectAccess features unique to UAG DirectAccess, including NAT64/DNS64.
